sys_script_include.name: BidValidationScriptInclude

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_2ad3aa8793f2821094e3f15a7bba1014
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.BidValidationScriptInclude</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>BidValidationScriptInclude</name><script><![CDATA[var BidValidationScriptInclude = Class.create();
BidValidationScriptInclude.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    validateBid: function() {
        var bidAmount = parseFloat(this.getParameter('bidAmount'));
        var itemSysId = this.getParameter('itemSysId');
        
        var itemGr = new GlideRecord('x_1383184_charityb_item');
        if (itemGr.get(itemSysId)) {
            var startBidAmount = parseFloat(itemGr.getValue('start_bid_amount'));
            var highestBidAmount = parseFloat(itemGr.getValue('highest_bid_amount'));
            
            if (bidAmount < startBidAmount) {
                return JSON.stringify({ valid: false, message: gs.getMessage('Bid amount must be at least the start bid amount.') });
            } else if (bidAmount <= highestBidAmount) {
                return JSON.stringify({ valid: false, message: gs.getMessage('Bid amount must be higher than the current highest bid.') });
            } else {
                return JSON.stringify({ valid: true });
            }
        } else {
            return JSON.stringify({ valid: false, message: gs.getMessage('Item not found.') });
        }
    }
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-19 16:59:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>2ad3aa8793f2821094e3f15a7bba1014</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>BidValidationScriptInclude</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2ad3aa8793f2821094e3f15a7bba1014</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-19 17:06:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
